alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Beauregard; East Cameron; Evangeline; Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion; Vernon; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 07 at 5:35AM CDT until October 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning for Central and Southwestern Louisiana this afternoon and early evening... ...Red Flag Warning for Central and Southwestern Louisiana Sunday afternoon and early evening... .A potent cold front pass through the region this morning will usher in northerly winds at 15 to 20 mph, gusting to 25 mph, along with dewpoints in the mid 30s to lower 40s by later this morning and afternoon. The low moisture will result in daytime relative humidity values dropping to 25 to 35 percent. Similar weather is expected for Sunday, although winds will be lighter. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT SUNDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... * AFFECTED AREA...Vernon, Rapides, Avoyelles, Beauregard, Allen, Evangeline, St. Landry, Lafayette, Upper St. Martin, Lower St. Martin, West Cameron, East Cameron, Northern Calcasieu, Northern Jefferson Davis, Northern Acadia, Upper Vermilion, Upper Iberia, Upper St. Mary, Southern Calcasieu, Southern Jefferson Davis, Southern Acadia, Lower Vermilion, Lower Iberia and Lower St. Mary. * TIMING...From 11 AM to 7 PM today and again from 11 AM to 7 PM Sunday. * WINDS...North 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph late this morning and afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent both today and Sunday. * TEMPERATURES...Low to mid 70s both today and Sunday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended and or prohibited in some areas. Please check burn ban laws in your County or Parish.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
